sentences.en: Algerian workers lack skills, a ZIEC employee said on condition of anonymity.
sentences.cn: 中鼎国际一位要求不透露姓名的员工称,阿尔及利亚工人缺乏技术.

sentences.en: Both mother and daughter, who have requested anonymity, are doing fine.
sentences.cn: 这对不愿意透露姓名的母女俩目前情况良好。

sentences.en: Complete anonymity is the best weapon I have.
sentences.cn: 彻底隐姓埋名是我最好的武器.

sentences.en: Embassy official , who spoke on condition of anonymity under diplomaticground rules.
sentences.cn: 出于外交规则, 他匿名接受采访.

sentences.en: Every step will be taken to preserve your anonymity.
sentences.cn: 将采取各种措施确保你的姓名保密。

sentences.en: He spoke on condition of anonymity, in line with company policy.
sentences.cn: 为了遵守公司规定,他要求匿名接收采访.

sentences.en: His greatness was clothed in anonymity.
sentences.cn: 他的伟大之处是藏而不露.

sentences.en: Names of people in the book were changed to preserve anonymity.
sentences.cn: 为了姓名保密，书中的人用的都是化名。

sentences.en: One official, who spoke on condition of anonymity (=  he would only speak if his name was not told  ) , said the White House took the threat very seriously.
sentences.cn: 一位不愿公开姓名的官员称，白宫非常重视这一威胁。

sentences.en: Our company promises to preserve the anonymity of all its clients.
sentences.cn: 我们公司承诺不公开客户的姓名.

sentences.en: the anonymity of city streets (=  you do not know anyone, and no one knows you  )
sentences.cn: 城市街头人人互不相识

sentences.en: The anonymity of the book gave rise to much speculation.
sentences.cn: 这本书的匿名引起许多猜测.

sentences.en: The donor dads were shadowy figures, guaranteed anonymity by the clinics.
sentences.cn: 捐精者都隐姓埋名.诊所也保证不透露他们的姓名.

sentences.en: The meanness of anonymity gave a shuddering obscenity to the moment.
sentences.cn: 这种匿名的卑鄙行为使他一时觉得下流得让人吃不消.

sentences.en: The official requested anonymity because the contract was not complete.
sentences.cn: 这位官员要求必须匿名,因为双方合约尚未谈完.

sentences.en: The officials anonymity because of the delicacy of the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 该官员不愿透露姓名,因为此谈判很微妙.

sentences.en: This tradition of guaranteeing anonymity began to develop quickly.
sentences.cn: 这种担保匿名的传统便开始迅速扩展开来.

sentences.en: THIS TRADITION OF GUARANTEEING ANONYMITY BEGAN TO DEVELOP QUICKLY.
sentences.cn: 匿名者,无名氏不被认识或知道的人.

words.tran_cn: 匿名的，无名的；无个性特征的

trans.tran_en: when other people do not know who you are or what your name is
